In order to make this festival as affordable as possible, it is a BRING YOUR OWN BEER event. No glass bottles are allowed on site. Please transfer everything to plastic bottles before heading to the festival. There will also be a bar on site for anyone wanting a refreshing pint!

While alcohol will be allowed in the festival arena, bottles and cans will not be allowed in our stage marquees. Disposable cups will not be allowed as they create unnecessary waste. Liquid transferred to open cups will be allowed.

Under 18s must be accompanied by a parent or legal guardian, who will have to sign accepting responsibility. Anyone under the age of 18 drinking alcohol, along with their accompanying adult, will be asked to leave the event. Proof of age is required for minors and accompanying adults
